definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The possibility of a last-ditch resistance by the enemy should not be dismissed.
sentences.chinese: 敌人负隅顽抗的可能性是不可不加考虑的。

sentences.english: The results indicated that gonorrhoea was related with infection of toxoplasma gondii.
sentences.chinese: 提示淋病患者存在合并弓形虫感染的可能性。

sentences.english: Well,I suppose one possibility would be to say the guy in New York is Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 我猜其中一个可能性会是，纽约家伙是拿破仑。

sentences.english: 'There's a real small chance but it's still a must-win game.
sentences.chinese: 可能性确实不大，但是我们必须拿下。

sentences.english: How can we possibly write about this in a dignified way?
sentences.chinese: 我们用体面的方法写这个词的可能性有多大？

sentences.english: It may be possible, then, to bring about a change in the US position.
sentences.chinese: 因此，美国转变立场的可能性还是存在的。

sentences.english: Advocacy of law-breaking heightens it still further.
sentences.chinese: 鼓吹违法行为更有助于提升这种可能性。

sentences.english: The innovated version of the stand Classico introduces several original features and possibilities.
sentences.chinese: 创新版本的原有特征介绍了几种站名和可能性。

sentences.english: The other likelihood is that you delegated prematurely.
sentences.chinese: 另一种可能性是，你进行了仓促的授权。

sentences.english: Using sorbitol as a substitute for polyglycerin to make an industrial deformer was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 试验了用山梨醇取代聚甘油制工业用消泡剂的可能性。

sentences.english: He becomes more and more interested in exploring the possibility of a "non-dancing" body.
sentences.chinese: 他对“非舞蹈化”肢体的可能性愈加关注。

sentences.english: What are my chances of dying in space?
sentences.chinese: 我死在太空的可能性是多少？

sentences.english: If you also have low bone density, your risk is even higher.
sentences.chinese: 如果骨密度还比较低的话，那可能性就更大了。

sentences.english: Such as really keep aggravation in deep freeze, won't rule out the probability of sealing the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 如确实冰冻严重，将不排除封山的可能性。

sentences.english: The other objective of this research is to seek the probability of using slag to replace wollastonite .
sentences.chinese: 同时并探讨以炉石取代钙矽石之可能性。

sentences.english: He ruminated over various possibilities concerning his future.
sentences.chinese: 他反复思考自己前途的各种可能性。

definition: a tiny bit/very little/next to nothing (idiom)
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
